title: Start
body:
Welcome to the game! Press [b]Spacebar[/b] while touching objects or NPC's to interact with them. Press Spacebar to also proceed the text and use arrows or WASD to select options.
This current build is just a small map with a few enemies and walls to test most implemented game features.

title: attackDesc
body:
[b]Sword:[/b] Not a spell per say, does low damage but also costs nothing to use. Can be rotated around you with the mouse | No MP use/ Low damage.
[b]Electric Shot:[/b] Fire an electric ball per click | medium MP use/ medium damage.
[b]Wind Shot:[/b] Fire a beam of wind the penetrates through enemies | medium MP use/ low damage (goes through enemies).
[b]Electric Burst:[/b] Fire electric balls in each cardinal and ordinal direction, can't be aimed but does high damage | High MP use/ High damage.
[b]Speed Boost:[/b] Hold the mouse button to increase your speed at the cost of MP | Low MP use.

title: enemyDesc
body:
[b]Slimes[/b] will follow you and deal a small bit of damage on touch.
[b]Ghosts[/b] will follow you and stop upon contact, preparing to explode before actually doing so after a second to deal high damage.
[b]Statues[/b] can't move but will regularly fire magical attacks at you in quick succession, they also have the highest health of current enemies.

title: controlDesc
body:
-Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around.
-Use left click on the mouse to fire spells, some aim at where your mouse is pointing while other have fixed firing or more supportive effects.
-The mouse scroll wheel or top row numbers (1-4) can be used to change spells.
-E is used to drink health potions while R is used to drink Mana potions

title: DevTools
body:
F1 toggles permanent invulnerability for the player
F4 shows some game stats, currently limited to: FPS, Player position and player firing angle.
Pressing P damages the player for 50 health.
